trans-unit.source: Displays a single column header in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 控件中显示一个列标题。

trans-unit.source: A column header is an item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control that contains heading text.
trans-unit.target: 列标题是中的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>包含标题文本的控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects can be added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> 可以将对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>类。

trans-unit.source: To add a group of columns to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加的列组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>类。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Index%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> class to determine where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is located in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Index%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>类以确定在何处<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>位于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> provides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> properties to set the text displayed in the control and the alignment of the text in the column header.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> 提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A>属性设置中控件和列标题中的文本的对齐方式显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, you can reference the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ListView%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>与关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件，你可以引用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ListView%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you want to copy a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> for use in another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Clone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要复制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>以供在其他<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Clone%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects and sets the column header's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>对象和设置列标题<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example also adds items and subitems to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还添加项和子项到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中的窗体和调用`PopulateListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects and sets the column header's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>对象和设置列标题<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example also adds items and subitems to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还添加项和子项到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中的窗体和调用`PopulateListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The index of the image to display in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 要显示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 中的图像的索引。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> class with the image specified.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的图像初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The key of the image to display in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 要显示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 中的图像的键。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> class with the image specified.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的图像初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Resizes the width of the column as indicated by the resize style.
trans-unit.target: 按照调整大小样式调整列宽。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.AutoResize%2A> method is only effective once the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> and containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> have been constructed, and the column is populated with items.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.AutoResize%2A>方法一次仅有效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>和包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>已构造了和的列填充的项。

trans-unit.source: If new items are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, the column will not resize unless <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.AutoResize%2A> is called again.
trans-unit.target: 如果新项添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>，列不会调整大小，除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.AutoResize%2A>会再次调用。

trans-unit.source: A value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle.None" /> is passed to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.AutoResize(System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle)" /> method when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View" /> property is a value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle.None" /> 属性值不是 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.AutoResize(System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle)" /> 的情况下，将一个 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View" /> 之外的值传递给了 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates an identical copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> that is not attached to any list view control.
trans-unit.target: 创建当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 的相同副本，它未附加到任何列表视图控件。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a copy of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示该 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 对象的一个副本的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to copy existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects from an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control for use in other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controls.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法复制现有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>从现有对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>用于其他控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display order of the column relative to the currently displayed columns.
trans-unit.target: 相对于当前所显示各列，获取或设置列的显示顺序。

trans-unit.source: The display order of the column, relative to the currently displayed columns.
trans-unit.target: 相对于当前显示列的列显示顺序。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 处置由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 占用的资源（内存除外）。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A> 后，应调用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A> 方法使 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> 处于不可用状态。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A>，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>以便可以通过垃圾回收回收其占用的内存。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: 每次释放对 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A> 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> object's destructor.
trans-unit.target: 否则为资源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>是使用不会被释放之前垃圾集合调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>对象的析构函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the image displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 中的图像的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the image displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 显示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 中的图像的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> property refers to the index of an image specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A>属性是指由指定的映像的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> property returns -1 if there is no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> set on the containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A>属性将返回-1，如果没有任何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>上包含的设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。

trans-unit.source: The image displayed in a column is typically used to indicate the state of items in the column.
trans-unit.target: 列中显示的图像通常用于指示列中的项的状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageKey%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageKey%2A> 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A>是互斥的这意味着如果其中一个是设置，另一个是设置为无效的值并忽略。

trans-unit.source: The image associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is typically used to indicate the state information.
trans-unit.target: 与关联的图像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>通常用于显示状态信息。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> to a value greater than the index of the last item in the associated image list, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> will be set to the index of the last item in the image list.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A>为大于关联的图像列表中中的最后一项的索引值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A>将设置为图像列表中的最后一项的索引。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex" /> is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex" /> 小于 -1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the image displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示在列中的图像的键。

trans-unit.source: The key of the image displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: 显示在列中的图像的键。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageKey%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageKey%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A>属性是互相排斥，这意味着如果一个设置，另一个是设置为无效的值并忽略。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageKey%2A> is set to an invalid value, an image will not be displayed, and an exception will not be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageKey%2A>设置为无效值，将不会显示图像，并且将不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The image associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is typically used to indicate the state information.
trans-unit.target: 与关联的图像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>通常用于显示状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the image list associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 的关联图像列表。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>返回的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control's <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection" /> of this column.
trans-unit.target: 获取该列在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection" /> 中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the column header within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control it is contained in.
trans-unit.target: 列标题在包含它的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 内从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property does not necessarily correspond to the current visual position of the column header within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值一定不对应的中的列标题 visual 当前位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。

trans-unit.source: This can be due to the user reordering the column headers at run time (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A> property is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: 这可能是由于用户的运行时重新排序的列标题 (时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A>属性设置为`true`)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is not contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control this property returns a value of -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>未包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制此属性返回值-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> is located in.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 所位于的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control that represents the control that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 控件，它表示包含该 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 的控件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> object is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性来确定哪些<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>对象与之关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains data to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象包含与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 的关联数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed in the column header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置列标题中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the column header.
trans-unit.target: 在列标题中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects and sets the column header's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>对象和设置列标题<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example also adds items and subitems to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还添加项和子项到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中的窗体和调用`PopulateListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the text displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> 中所显示文本的水平对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment.Left" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to provide different text alignment settings for the text displayed in each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性来提供不同的文本中每个显示的文本的对齐方式设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>。

trans-unit.source: Due to a limitation in the underlying control, this property has no effect on the first column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, which is always aligned to the left.
trans-unit.target: 由于基础控件中的限制，此属性不起的第一列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件，始终向左对齐。

trans-unit.source: To work around this limitation in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and paint the column header yourself.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此限制[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，你可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件和自己绘制列标题。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects and sets the column header's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>对象和设置列标题<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example also adds items and subitems to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还添加项和子项到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中的窗体和调用`PopulateListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, if any.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 的名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 不应重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, if any, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 的名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />（如果有）；如果 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 未命名，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width of the column, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 列的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使您能够设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> can be set to adjust at run time to the column contents or heading.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>可以设置为在运行时的列内容或标题调整。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the width of the longest item in the column, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> property to -1.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整的列中最长的项的宽度，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A>为-1 的属性。

trans-unit.source: To autosize to the width of the column heading, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> property to -2.
trans-unit.target: 自动调整列标题的宽度，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A>属性设置为-2。

trans-unit.source: Unexpected behavior can result when the combined width of all columns exceeds 32,768 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 所有列的组合的宽度超过 32768 个像素，会导致意外的行为。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects and sets the column header's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>对象和设置列标题<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example also adds items and subitems to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还添加项和子项到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中的窗体和调用`PopulateListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。
